H0.text: To which family of animals does the okapi belong. Antelope

H1.text: To which family of animals does the okapi belong. Deer

H2.text: To which family of animals does the okapi belong. Cattle

H3.text: To which family of animals does the okapi belong. Girafe

A4.text: The okapi belongs to the family Giraffidae.

A5.text: The okapi and the giraffe are the only living members of the family Giraffidae.

A6.text: The giraffe and the okapi are the only living members of the family Giraffidae.

A7.text: The giraffe is classified under the family Giraffidae, along with its closest extant relative, the okapi.
